page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: {A typical Sunday in the life of Lynda {Ridley,aged 9.}" I get up at 7a.m. and have Crunchy Nut Cornflakes and a Bacon sandwich for breakfast.I get my hair brushed,and go out with Dad's puppy.I help my Mum to milk the goats, go with my Dad to feed the Tups,then change into my good clothes for Sunday School.We sing hymns,and colour pictures.When I go home we often go to my Gran's house in the car.When we've had a drink she gives me bread to feed the swans on the Coquet River." {A typical Saturday for David Johnston, {aged 11.}"I watch the Wide Awake Club on T.V.in bed until 9a.m.then get up, have breakfast and let the puppies out.I watch more T.V.,have lunch and then work on my Technical Lego.I make farm vehicles.Sometimes I help my Dad around the farm."
